mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ml_no, ml_title, ml_newaddr, ml_count ,ROWNUM rno FROM ie_mainlist) WHERE rno BETWEEN 1 and 5 order by ml_count desc
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ml_no, ml_title, ml_newaddr, ml_count ,ROWNUM rno FROM ie_mainlist order by ml_count desc) WHERE rno between #{rno} AND #{rno}+4 order by ml_count desc

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM rno, ml_no, ml_title, ml_newaddr, ml_count, ml_tag FROM( SELECT ml_no, ml_title, ml_newaddr, ml_count, ml_tag FROM ie_mainlist WHERE ml_tag like '%'||#{ml_tag}||'%' order by ml_count desc ) ) WHERE rno BETWEEN #{rno} and #{rno}+4
mapper.update: UPDATE ie_mainlist SET ml_count = ml_count+1 WHERE ml_no = #{ml_no}

SELECT count(*) FROM IE_ML_FAVORITES WHERE MLF_MNO = (SELECT m_no FROM ie_member WHERE m_id = #{m_id}) AND MLF_MLNO = #{ml_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IE_ML_FAVORITES VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(MLF_NO)+1, 1000001) from IE_ML_FAVORITES), #{ml_no}, (SELECT m_no FROM ie_member WHERE m_id = #{m_id}) )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM IE_ML_FAVORITES WHERE mlf_mlno = #{ml_no} AND mlf_mno = (SELECT m_no FROM ie_member WHERE m_id = #{m_id})
